name: test_e2e_with_logs[216_EMRG_MONGO_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_001` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $where JavaScript injection |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$where": "this.username == 'admin'"}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20%27admin%27%22%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:16:15.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_001-1767402975770-cymy9o pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_001 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24where%22%3A%20%22this.username%20%3D%3D%20%27admin%27%22%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
